title: Credit Card Fraud Detection
description: Developed a logistic regression model to detect fraudulent credit card transactions with 98% accuracy, using feature engineering and model evaluation visualized through interactive Tableau dashboards.

title: AWS-Based Recommender System
description: Designed and implemented a cloud-native architecture for a content-based recommender engine using Amazon S3 for scalable data storage and DynamoDB for fast, structured metadata access.

title: Team-Based ML Deployment Pipeline
description: Collaborated with a cross-functional team to deploy machine learning models as RESTful APIs using Flask, enabling seamless integration into existing AWS infrastructure with real-time monitoring dashboards.

title: Real-time Logistics Optimization
description: Deployed a real-time logistics optimization model using Flask on AWS EC2, improving anomaly detection and using ClearML for NLP experiment tracking, metric monitoring, and version control.

title: YouTube Content Performance Predictor
description: Created a machine learning pipeline to predict content performance metrics using historical YouTube data, leveraging PySpark for data processing and Amazon QuickSight for visualization.

title: Healthcare Patient Outcome Prediction
description: Applied machine learning models to predict patient outcomes from healthcare datasets, creating interactive Power BI dashboards with DAX-based KPIs to support operational decision-making.
